alert.note: Alert for Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 2:16PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Miami-Dade County through 245 PM EDT... At 216 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over The Hammocks, or near Kendall. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kendall, The Redland, Richmond West, Richmond Heights, Country Walk, Kendale Lakes, West Kendall, Intersection Krome And Kendall Drive, Miccosukee Resort, Sunset, Zoo Miami, The Crossings, The Hammocks, West Perrine, Glenvar Heights, Tamiami, Kendall West, Inlikita, Three Lakes and South Miami Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
